title: Avail for Trade - Signed T206 McBride
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: Avail for Trade - Signed T206 McBride
posts.post_content:
In my quest for signed T206s, I've acquired dups of McBride.

I'd be interested in trading for another signed T206. I would even add a little cash in a swap.

[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/mcbride.jpg[/IMG]

still looking to trade one of these signed T206s for another signed T206 i need.

willing to add cash to swap!

Either one of these still available for trade for another signed T206.

More than willing to add some cash in a trade to make it worth while.

Still available for trade for another signed T206.

Entertaining offers as well.
